title: Putin critic Alexei Navalny awarded Europe's top human rights prize
content:
1. Putin critic Alexei Navalny awarded Europe's top human rights prize  NPR
  2. Russia's opposition leader Alexei Navalny wins European Parliament's Sakharov Prize  The Washington Post
  3. Navalny wins top EU human rights award  The Hill
  4. Kremlin critic Navalny wins EU rights prize for his "immense bravery"  Reuters
  5. Navalny, Putin’s Imprisoned Foe, Wins E.U.’s Top Human Rights Award  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
